entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
